alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kent; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 3:40PM EST until February 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of one tenth to one quarter of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of northern Connecticut, southeastern Massachusetts and northern Rhode Island. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 7 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions by mid to late Friday morning along with a Flash freeze by early afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to freezing rain and sleet Friday morning with a flash freeze as temperatures fall into the upper 20s.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kent; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Western Kent
